sentences.sContent: Aspirin may discourage tumour growth in some types of cancer.
sentences.sCn: 阿司匹林可能遏制某些恶性肿瘤的生长。

sentences.sContent: You should not let one failure discourage you.
sentences.sCn: 你不该失败一次就灰心丧气

sentences.sContent: ...In-class exams are believed to discourage cheating in exams...

remMethod.val: dis(消失掉) ＋ courage(精神) → 使精神消失掉 → 使泄气

words.tran: 使人沮丧的；令人气馁的
使人气馁地，使人沮丧地；阻止地
劝阻（discourage的过去分词）；使失去勇气

trans.tranOther: to make something less likely to happen
